hasMenuItem.name: Empanada Puff (Chicken) (1pc)
hasMenuItem.description:
Introducing Lyra Lou Cakes' mouth-watering Chicken Empanada - a savory pastry that is sure to satisfy your cravings! Made with only the freshest and finest ingredients, our Chicken Empanada is perfect for a quick snack or as a meal on the go.

Each empanada is filled with tender chunks of chicken, mixed with a flavorful blend of spices and vegetables, all encased in a buttery and flaky pastry crust. Our empanadas are baked to perfection, giving you the perfect balance of crispy and juicy with every bite.

Whether you're looking for a delicious and convenient snack, a tasty addition to your lunch, or a crowd-pleasing appetizer for your next party, Lyra Lou Cakes' Chicken Empanada is the perfect choice. Each order comes with six empanadas, making it easy to share with friends and family or save some for later.

So what are you waiting for? 

Treat yourself to the delicious and irresistible taste of Lyra Lou Cakes' Chicken Empanada today!

hasMenuItem.description:

For pickups scheduled on December 31st, please note that the cutoff date is December 28th at 12 pm.

Beat the holiday rush and ensure you don't miss out on our popular Ube—order early to avoid disappointment. Additionally, we're open on December 24th, 25th, 26th, and December 31st. Thank you so much all.

﻿


Introducing our signature round 8" Ube Mousse Layer Cake with Ube Halaya Filling! Made with only the finest and freshest ingredients, this cake is a feast for the senses.
The soft and fluffy layers of sponge cake are generously filled with a creamy Ube Mousse, which has been expertly crafted to balance the sweetness of the cake with the distinct earthy flavor of ube.

At the center of it all lies a luscious Ube Halaya filling, adding a delightful texture and richness t...

hasMenuItem.name: Sans Rival Layered Cake
hasMenuItem.description:
Introducing our mouth-watering 8" round Sans Rival or slices - the perfect indulgence for any dessert lover! Made with the finest ingredients, our Sans Rival is a decadent combination of layers of crispy meringue, rich buttercream, and crunchy cashew nuts.

Each slice of our Sans Rival is carefully crafted to ensure that every bite is a symphony of flavors and textures. The meringue layers are perfectly crispy, while the buttercream filling is smooth and creamy. The addition of cashew nuts adds a delightful crunch and nutty flavor that perfectly complements the sweetness of the meringue and buttercream.

Our 8" round Sans Rival or slices are perfect for any occasion - whether you're celebrating a special milestone or simply indulging in a well-deserved treat. 
Serve it as a dessert after a delicious meal, or enjoy it as a mid-day snack with a cup of coffee.

Our Sans Rival is also beautifully presented, making it an elegant addition to any dessert table. The round shape and intrica...

hasMenuItem.name: #yvrcakechallenge Pistachio Ube Gateau Opera 6" Round
hasMenuItem.description:
Thank you to all who supported and ordered this delicious opera cake.  We will have it available again in the Spring and Summer time.  Please keep posted.  


6" Round PISTACHIO UBE GATEAU OPERA by Chef Lyra
This cake is an entry to the #yvrcakechallenge by @vanfoodster (Instagram).

Thank you for your support in the #yvrcakechallenge. This Pistachio Ube (Calamansi) Gateau Opera won 1st place along with Cassandra Cake Co. We congratulate them and all the winners.


Creation Details:

Enrobed in a Dark chocolate glaze. Inside are the 4 layers of Calamansi brushed Ube sponge and Ube ganache protective layering, Toasted and Grounded Pistachio Nuts Buttercream, Banana Puree Infused Ube Mousse Filling; Topped with Banana Crisp, pistachio macaron, and toasted grounded pistachio nuts.

hasMenuItem.description:
SALE ENDS DECEMBER 31, 2023

Introducing Lyra Lou Cakes' 12 oz Ube Halaya Jar—a delectable blend of rich, Ube  goodness crafted with care.


Uses:
Spread it on warm toast, swirl it into your morning yogurt, or use it as a luscious cake filling. The possibilities are as endless as your imagination. Ube Halaya Jar at Lyra Lou Cakes is not just a treat; it's a culinary adventure waiting to unfold.
Nutrition Facts:
Delight guilt-free with a peek into the nutritional goodness. Our Ube Halaya Jar is a source of joy that fits seamlessly into your balanced lifestyle.
Dive into the world of culinary creativity and elevate your dishes with Lyra Lou Cakes' Ube Halaya Jar. It's not just a spread; it's an experience.

hasMenuItem.description:
Introducing our adorable Bear Face Cake, a cute and delicious addition to any celebration! This cake is made with the highest quality ingredients and is covered in smooth buttercream frosting. You can choose between classic vanilla or rich chocolate cake layers, both perfectly complemented by our creamy buttercream coverage.

For those who crave something a little different, we offer the option of dulce de leche or mango cream flavor. Each bite of our Bear Cake is bursting with flavor and sure to delight your taste buds.

Our Bear Face Cake is perfect for any occasion - from birthdays to baby showers and everything in between. The charming bear face design will make your guests smile, and the delicious taste will leave them asking for more.

Order now and make your celebration even more special with our Bear Face Cake!

hasMenuItem.name: 8"-9" Spiderman Cake, Buttercream, One Size only
hasMenuItem.description:
Indulge your senses with the spectacular Spiderman Cake from Lyra Lou Cakes—a true marvel in every bite. This cake features a luscious buttercream coverage, meticulously adorned to replicate the iconic Spiderman design, as showcased in the photo.

Choose from our delectable chocolate or vanilla cake base options, providing the perfect canvas for your superhero celebration. Filling choices includes vanilla creme, mango creme, dulce de leche or rich chocolate ganache.

At Lyra Lou Cakes, we prioritize your safety and well-being. Please be advised that we handle various nuts in our shop, and while we take every precaution, our cakes may contain traces. We kindly request that you refrain from placing an order if any of the party attendees have allergies to cake ingredients.

To ensure perfection for your special occasion, we kindly request a minimum of 2 weeks' notice for the creation of this 8" Spiderman Cake.   

Thank you for your support!

LLC Team

hasMenuItem.name: Birthday Greeting Pennant Banner, 36" x 48"
hasMenuItem.description:
Each pennant is made with 15oz block-out, scrim vinyl material for decoration that looks crisp for as long as possible. Each pennant has a slick white matte finish with two brass grommets on the top corners. 2x Hanging ropes included.


.: Material: 15oz block out scrim vinyl
.: Two brass grommets on each top corner
.: Two white ropes for hanging
.: Suitable for indoor and outdoor use


White matte finish
Product has a white matte finish


For indoor and outdoor use
These banners are made using water-resistant vinyl and water resistant inks


Vibrant colors
The latest printing techniques provide bright and crisp colors matching your craziest designs


Trimmed edges
Smooth and solid surface




Image by [Rashad Ashur / Shutterstock]


SIZE GUIDE
36″ × 48″
Width, in 36.00
Height, in 48.00


CARE INSTRUCTIONS
Use non-abrasive, non-ammonium based products for cleaning. Dish soap with warm water is only recommended for spot cleaning.

review.reviewBody: Cakes are great. Food is good. Presentation is delightful but i was expecting more authentic pinoy flavors built in rather then added separately. As a Chef i can tell these items are just built and added like mise en place rather than braised together such as the adobo. The egg is normally braised together too but was just a hard boiled egg. The potatoes were just boiled with no color or caramelizatiin. The chicken sisig was better but definitely not traditional but with a flare sure but not a second time. I'm hesitant to order more food. Cake sure. Decent food though.
The Leche Flan (Crème Caramel) is to die for, and the Banana Yema Turnover (1 pc) is delicious!
The only place we go to for halo-halo! Best in town!
Best sweets I've ever had, truly wonderful desserts here! Well worth the money.
Similar in style to Jolibees palabok ; taste a little different but good ; more in quantity per order . Good shelf life in fridge .
